info.title: Supaglue Management API
info.description:
# Introduction

Welcome to the Supaglue Management API documentation. You can use this API to manage customer integrations and connections.

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://god.gw.postman.com/run-collection/18172762-35306f94-8368-4412-b7f3-72715131f727?action=collection%2Ffork&source=rip_markdown&collection-url=entityId%3D18172762-35306f94-8368-4412-b7f3-72715131f727%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D4d2a33f3-a9f9-41f4-ac2e-5ad4db4a5edb)

### Base API URL

```
https://api.supaglue.io/mgmt/v2
```

200.description: Add object to provider with schema.

get.description: Get a list of Sync Configs
Get a list of Sync Run objects.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The customer ID that uniquely identifies the customer in your application

parameters.name: object_type
parameters.description: The object type to filter by

get.description: Get a list of Sync Info

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The customer ID that uniquely identifies the customer in your application

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The customer ID that uniquely identifies the customer in your application

tags.name: Customers
tags.description: A `Customer` represents one of your customers.

tags.name: Connections
tags.description: A `Connection` represents a Customer's connection to a Provider.

tags.name: Destinations
tags.description: A `Destination` is a place where to which data can be written.

tags.name: Providers
tags.description: A `Provider` is a CRM or other system that we can connect to.

tags.name: Schemas
tags.description: A `Schema` is a description of the data that can be synced from a Provider to a Destination or manipulated by the Actions API.

tags.name: SyncConfigs
tags.description: A `SyncConfig` is a configuration for how to sync your Customers' data from a Provider to a Destination on a schedule.

tags.name: Syncs
tags.description: A `Sync` is a way for a Customer to sync data from a Provider to a Destination on a schedule.

tags.name: Sync Runs
tags.description: A `Sync Run` is a single execution of a Sync at a point in time.

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description: A `Webhook` is a way for Supaglue to notify you when events have happened.

ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key to allow developers to access the API

schema_id.description: If set, will sync these mapped fields into the raw_data column in addition to the common model. If not set, will fetch all fields as is.

instance_url.description: Instance URL for the connected customer.

use_managed_oauth.description: True: use Supaglue's OAuth application credentials. False: Use the provided OAuth application credentials.

page_size.name: page_size
page_size.description: Number of results to return per page

customer_id.name: customer_id
customer_id.description: The customer ID that uniquely identifies the customer in your application

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the data was received successfully
